DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether new 80 mg atorvastatin tablet bioequivalent 80 mg commercial atorvastatin tablet ( LipitorÂ® ) .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Comparing A New 80 Mg Atorvastatin Tablet To A 80 Mg Atorvastatin Commercial Tablet
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) disease clinical finding screen . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day 5 half life precede first dose study medication .
